abstract: Taiwan will allow contract chipmakers and flat-panel firms to acquire rivals in China, a government official said on Tuesday, in a move that analysts said will help cement TSMC and UMC’s lead in the semiconductor sector.
snippet: Taiwan will allow contract chipmakers and flat-panel firms to acquire rivals in China, a government official said on Tuesday, in a move that analysts said will help cement TSMC and UMC’s lead in the semiconductor sector.
lead_paragraph: Taiwan will allow contract chip makers and flat-panel firms to acquire rivals in China, a government official said on Tuesday, in a move that analysts said will help cement TSMC and UMC‘s lead in the semiconductor sector, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Taiwan Opens Door to Mainland Chip Takeovers
